speaker: agent
text: [LOCATION] for calling [ORGANIZATION] where you're in good hands.

speaker: agent
text: This call may be monitored or recorded for quality assurance purposes using your keypad.

speaker: customer
text: Please choose one of these options.

speaker: agent
text: If you're calling for auto insurance, press [PHONE_NUMBER].

speaker: agent
text: For homeowners insurance, press [PHONE_NUMBER].

speaker: agent
text: Please enter the zip code where you need coverage.

speaker: agent
text: If we can help you with quotes for insurance today, please know that we may need to gather information from other sources, such as driving records or credit reports for you or other members of your household.

speaker: agent
text: By requesting these quotes, you authorize the sharing of information among affiliates of [ORGANIZATION] [ORGANIZATION] [ORGANIZATION] so we can offer additional insurance policy options to consider that will help meet the protection needs of your entire household.

speaker: agent
text: Please know that [ORGANIZATION] takes your privacy seriously and we have a detailed policy on how we treat your personal information.

speaker: agent
text: As permitted by law, this and any subsequently collected information may be shared with outside parties who perform services on [ORGANIZATION] behalf without your authorization.

speaker: customer
text: You have the right to access or correct this information.

speaker: agent
text: If you want to see our privacy statement, let us know or visit [URL] you may request that your credit information be updated.

speaker: customer
text: And if you question the accuracy of the credit information, we will reevaluate any decisions we made using corrected credit information from a consumer reporting agency.

speaker: agent
text: Under [LOCATION] law, it is a crime to knowingly provide false, incomplete or misleading information to an insurance company for the purpose of defrauding the company.

speaker: customer
text: Penalties include imprisonment, fines and denial of insurance benefits.

speaker: agent
text: Thank you for calling off [ORGANIZATION] [ORGANIZATION].

speaker: customer
text: Ms. [PERSON_NAME].

speaker: agent
text: Who would I have the pleasure of speaking for?

speaker: customer
text: [PERSON_NAME]?

speaker: agent
text: Phone number.

speaker: customer
text: Come on.

speaker: agent
text: Hello?

speaker: customer
text: Hello.

speaker: agent
text: Hi.

speaker: agent
text: How are you?

speaker: customer
text: Okay.

speaker: agent
text: Is it your [OCCUPATION] you called him?

speaker: customer
text: I'm sorry, you called me about insurance for automobile, I believe.

speaker: agent
text: No, that would have been a different company.

speaker: customer
text: They would have been a third party company and they just transferred you to me.

speaker: agent
text: So if you would like to look into auto insurance, I'd be more than happy to help you.

speaker: agent
text: I think that was what this was about, but I appreciate it.

speaker: customer
text: I don't believe I need any.

speaker: agent
text: Thank you, though.

speaker: customer
text: Okay.

speaker: agent
text: I do appreciate you.

speaker: customer
text: Thank you.

speaker: agent
text: You have been kicked from this conference.
